name: Game Music Impacts on Player Performance
name_original: Game Music Impacts on Player Performance
description:
This is a short 5-7 minute video game experiment where the player will answer survey questions and play two different games while wearing headphones to listen to the games' music. 

Requirements: 

  1. Keyboard and mouse
  2. Headphones or earphones with the volume on
  3. Effort placed into each of the game rounds in the experiment
  4. Please only complete this experiment once per user

The results of the game will be anonymous and used to produce a research report.

Download instructions:

  1. Download 'Research Project Build.zip'
  2. Extract folder to your computer
  3. Open the 'Research Project' application to begin the experiment

Music (played in random order in game demo):

  • Deal With Those Pieces - Evil Mind Entertainment©
  • Funky Chill Loop -W.O.W. Sound
  • Boss - Zach Striefel
  • Stage3 - Zach Striefel
  • Affinity-Oriental - Kyle 
  • PP_Destiny_FULL_Loop - wowsoundsg
